items.sentence: Tom made a promise to himself that he would never make the same mistake again.
Tom took off his dirty clothes and put them directly into the washing machine.
Tom tried not to listen to Mary and John discussing their financial situation.
If you\'re interested in going to the zoo tomorrow, I\'ll pick you up at 2:30.
Do you think Tom really intends to drink that whole bottle of wine by himself?
I wonder whether or not Tom has ever asked Mary why she dropped out of school.
I think the first thing you might want to do is put some gasoline in your car.
I want to apologize to you for calling you a jerk in front of your girlfriend.
Make sure that the first coat of paint is dry before applying the second coat.
Tom wedged the claw of the crowbar under the nailhead and pulled out the nail.
